content: Take the left path to reach the next open area where you’ll face off against both a Rat Soldier and a Rat Governor. Lure the Soldier out of range of the Governor’s lightning attacks to take them on separately, and don’t move yourself out too far, as more enemies and archers are waiting up ahead.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Sandgate_Village_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Sandgate Village Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Village Entrance' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Lang-Li-Guhh-Baw'.
The content is as follows:
Take the left path to reach the next open area where you’ll face off against both a Rat Soldier and a Rat Governor. Lure the Soldier out of range of the Governor’s lightning attacks to take them on separately, and don’t move yourself out too far, as more enemies and archers are waiting up ahead.
